text: OKAY EVERYONE:  I pushed a big change to the master branch. I changed around a lot of the application, because Homy wanted me to seperate login info from user profile. So now we have two models: User (email, password, password_confirmation, admin), and Profile (first_name, last_name, gender, etc). I also added interests to Profile. Profile and user have seperate forms. <@U4F33615G> I completely changed the form not because I didn't like what you did, but because I had to separate it out and put in different fields. It doesn't look too great right now but if you have time later you can change it a bit. <@U4FP56WS2> You have a big task now: fix the failing errors. They're failing because the db has changed. We also need tests for Profile model.
Don't forget to run the following: `bundle install`, `rails db:migrate`, `rails db:migrate:reset`, `rails db:seed`
If anyone notices any bugs, add them to bug report list on trello.
Ok tomorrow is Wednesday. Everyone tell me how they're doing with their part.
<@U4FP56WS2> I updated Trello. You have a lot to do. Is it too much? Is anyone else willing to write some tests?
